aka: Luk Rak Phra Jao the Series

cast.name: 纳缇萨勘·差洛特 Natsakan Chairote

this_title: ลูกรักพระเจ้าเดอะซีรีส์
trans_title: Luk Rak Phra Jao the Series
introduction: 在旧金山,曼教练是梅特里福音教会的领导者和看守者,在他的父母去世后接管了教会。除了在教会中担任领导者的角色外,Mman教练也是当地高中的体育教师,并在学校成立了一个水球俱乐部,该俱乐部完全由基督徒组成。俱乐部成员包括索恩,冠军,投撤,普,尤特,皮奇,考伯,米, 陶,基姆,孙和新成员勒特。也是学校的校友,他在教堂协助指导和帮助。In Srisaket, coach Man is the leader and caretaker of the Maitree Gospel Church, taking over after his parents passed away. Aside from his role as a leader in the church, coach Man is also a physical education teacher at the local high school and founded a water polo club at the school, which is made up entirely of Christians. The club members include Sawan, Champ, Touch, Poo, Yot, Petch, Kob, Me, Tao, Kem, Sun, and new member Lert. Also Cha, an alumni of the school, assists in coaching and helping out at the church.
foreign_title: ลูกรักพระเจ้าเดอะซีรีส์
